# Filtering Data

## WHERE

`WHERE` template:
```
SELECT
  column_1,
  column_2,
  ...
FROM
  table_name
WHERE
  conditions;
```

| Operator      | Description           |
|:-------------:|:----------------------|
| `=`           | Equal                 |
| `>`           | Greater than          |
| `<`           | Less than             |
| `>=`          | Greater than or equal |
| `<=`          | Less than or equal    |
| `<>` or `!=`  | Not equal             |
| `AND`         | Boolean AND           |
| `OR`          | Boolean OR            |
